summary: Gaby, Fer's mother, and Silvia, Diego's mother, live their lives happily, until one day, due to Diego's kidney disease they find out that the kids were switched at birth.
cast: Ludwika Paleta|Iliana Fox|Michel Brown|Fernanda Castillo|Antón Araiza|Juan Ignacio Aranda|Arturo Barba|Pilar Boliver|Elsa Diana Jaimes Buitrón|Julián Fidalgo|Emiliano González|Sharon Kleinberg|Diana Lein|Pilar Ixquic Mata|Paulina Maya|Pedro Mira|Martha Claudia Moreno|Vicente Torres Murredu|Denisse Prieto|David Antonio Roca|Juan Ríos|Shaula Satinka|Santiago Torres|Mauricio Valle
title: Rumbos Paralelos
